items.title: Walmart recalls potentially radioactive frozen shrimp sold in 13 states
items.description: Federal officials detected Cesium-137, a radioactive isotope, in shipping containers and a sample of breaded shrimp imported from Indonesia.

items.title: The ‘Ghosts of 2007’ and the graybeard ‘Nifty 50’: BofA looks at the rare situation in markets and finds ominous parallels to the GFC and the dotcom bubble
items.description: Conditions are like they were in 2007, or in the late 1990s, depending on how you look at the Fed raising rates during rising inflation, and the top 5...

items.title: Exclusive: MAHA is reshaping Amazon’s Whole Foods and other consumer packaged goods companies’ supply chains more than tariffs right now, manufacturing platform CEO says
items.description: Keychain, a manufacturing platform, has seen an uptick in “natural” projects from its customers as food retailers respond to the healthy eating push.

items.title: Elon Musk’s teen prodigy Kairan Quazi is ditching SpaceX for billionaire Ken Griffin’s Citadel Securities
items.description: Quazi has defied every expectation since he was 10. Now the teen prodigy is defying the allure of Silicon Valley.

items.title: Triangles are stamped all over Nvidia’s $920 million headquarters, and there’s a symbolic reason why
items.description: Triangles, for Nvidia, represent both a nod to history, but also a crucial lesson learned.
